nodes.description: Native rule definitions for the agent.

nodes.description: System documentation organized by role.

nodes.description: Cross-role guides and references.

nodes.description: Architecture, implementation, and planning documents for the Builder role.

nodes.description: The meta-structure defining how the system remembers.

nodes.description: Rules defining valid nodes, types, and relationships.

nodes.description: The current snapshot of the system as stored in JSON files.

nodes.description: Structured planning workflow for non-trivial work

nodes.description: Complete planning workflow guide

nodes.description: Template for creating new plans

nodes.description: Template for documenting completed plans

nodes.description: Plans currently being worked on

nodes.title: 3-Track Architecture Pattern
nodes.description: GOLD! This is the 3-track architecture pattern we use. Path: 'docs/developer/agent-design/3-track-architecture.md'. Referenced by agent-development workflow. This is a universal builder pattern that we already use in Manager Agent. MUST extract.

nodes.title: Knowledge Graph Design Pattern
nodes.description: GOLD! KG design documentation. Referenced by KG integrity behavior and KG management skills. Universal pattern for how to design and maintain knowledge graphs. MUST extract.

nodes.title: Behavior Design Pattern
nodes.description: GOLD! Universal pattern for designing agent behaviors. Path: 'docs/developer/agent-design/behavior-design.md'. Referenced by agent-development workflow. This is exactly what we need for builder patterns.

nodes.title: Skill Design Pattern
nodes.description: GOLD! Universal pattern for designing agent skills. Referenced by skill-creation workflow. Essential builder pattern documentation.

nodes.title: Markdown Conventions
nodes.description: GOLD! Universal markdown conventions for documentation. Referenced by documentation-first behavior. We use markdown extensively in Manager Agent - this is highly relevant.

nodes.title: JSON Schema Patterns
nodes.description: GOLD! Universal JSON schema patterns. Related to KG design. Referenced by JSON validation and KG integrity skills. We use JSON extensively for KGs - highly relevant.

nodes.title: Developer Patterns Folder
nodes.description: GOLD! Universal patterns folder containing: content-extraction, graph-construction, cross-linking, validation. All universal builder patterns.

nodes.title: Graph Construction Pattern
nodes.description: GOLD! Universal pattern for constructing knowledge graphs. Related to KG design. Referenced by auto-integrate skill. This is exactly what we're doing with Manager Agent KGs!

nodes.title: Cross-Linking Pattern
nodes.description: GOLD! Universal pattern for cross-linking between KG tracks. Referenced by intelligent-linking and validate-cross-track skills. We use this in Manager Agent!

nodes.title: Validation Pattern
nodes.description: GOLD! Universal validation patterns. Referenced by testing-validation workflow. We just built KG validation - highly relevant!

nodes.title: Agent Design Documentation
nodes.description: Universal agent design documentation. Contains: 3-track-architecture, knowledge-graphs, behavior-design, skill-design. All universal builder patterns applicable to any agent project.

nodes.title: File Processing Patterns
nodes.description: Universal pattern for processing different file types (PDF, Word, HTML). Referenced by knowledge-extraction workflow and processing skills. Applicable to any agent that processes documents.

nodes.title: Content Extraction Pattern
nodes.description: Universal pattern for extracting content from documents. Referenced by knowledge-extraction workflow. Applicable to any agent that processes knowledge sources.
